title: skydiary
description: Write a daily entry and you're done. You get recaps and advice in total privacy with an AI friend, coach, and mentor.

about.title: about skydiary
about.description 0: the benefits of journaling are countless but you don't get any feedback.
about.description 1: the process of writing is solitary and private.
about.description 2: you get totally private advice and counsel from different personas (powered by AI)
about.description 3: the emphasis is on simplicity. all you need to do is write a daily entry
about.description 4: you get automatic tags on your entry, recaps of your week, and advice or feedback when you want it
about.description 5: you can create a persona for anyone you want to talk to and learn new things you might not have imagined

auth.description: these details help to personalize your experience, privately.
auth.passcode expires: your passcode will expire in 5 minutes

settings.description: these details help to personalize your experience, privately.

configuration.heading: Server Error
configuration.message: There is a problem with the server configuration. Please contact the site administrator.

accessdenied.heading: Access Denied
accessdenied.message: You don't have permission to signin or register on this site.

verification.heading: Unable to Sign In
verification.message: That token is not valid. Please try again or refresh the page to request a new one.

default.heading: Error
default.message: There was an unknown error. Please refresh the page and try again.

auth.subject: skydiary sign in passcode
auth.goBack: go back to skydiary and enter your passcode to log in.
auth.safelyIgnoreIt: if you didn't request this email you can safely ignore it
